price: 19. Oo aad fashay falkaagii aad fashay (dishay nin) waxaadna tahay abaal laawe.
arabic: وَفَعَلۡتَ فَعۡلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِي فَعَلۡتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wafaʿalta faʿlataka allatī faʿalta wa-anta mina al-kāfirīna
